import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import { ArrowLeft, Search, Star, Clock, User, BookOpen, BarChart3, User as UserIcon } from 'lucide-react'; const CoursesPage = () => { const [searchQuery, setSearchQuery] = useState(''); const [activeFilter, setActiveFilter] = useState('Popular'); const filters = [ 'Popular', 'New', 'Certified', 'Project Management', 'Agile', 'Scrum', 'Kanban', 'Lean', 'Six Sigma' ]; const categories = [ { name: 'Project Management', courses: [ { id: 1, title: 'Project Management Fundamentals', instructor: 'Youcef Belouz', rating: 4.8, reviews: 125, price: 43, originalPrice: 89, duration: '8 weeks', level: 'Beginner', image: 'PM', enrolled: 1200, certification: 'PMP' }, { id: 2, title: 'Advanced Project Management', instructor: 'Sarah Chen', rating: 4.9, reviews: 89, price: 79, originalPrice: 129, duration: '12 weeks', level: 'Intermediate', image: 'APM', enrolled: 856, certification: 'PMP' } ] }, { name: 'Agile', courses: [ { id: 3, title: 'Agile Project Management', instructor: 'David Lee', rating: 4.7, reviews: 203, price: 79, originalPrice: 149, duration: '10 weeks', level: 'Intermediate', image: 'Agile', enrolled: 2100, certification: 'PMI-ACP' }, { id: 4, title: 'Scrum Master Certification', instructor: 'Maria Garcia', rating: 4.9, reviews: 156, price: 99, originalPrice: 199, duration: '6 weeks', level: 'Advanced', image: 'Scrum', enrolled: 1800, certification: 'CSM' } ] } ]; const filteredCourses = categories.flatMap(category => category.courses.filter(course => course.title.toLowerCase().includes(searchQuery.toLowerCase()) || course.instructor.toLowerCase().includes(searchQuery.toLowerCase()) ) ); return (
{/* Header */}

{/* Main Content */}
{/* Search Bar */}
setSearchQuery(e.target.value)} className="search-bar pl-10" />

${course.originalPrice}
)}
{course.instructor}
{course.rating} ({course.reviews} reviews)
{course.duration}
{course.level} {course.enrolled} enrolled
{course.certification} View Course
))}
))}
{/* Featured Courses */}

Featured Courses

{filteredCourses.slice(0, 3).map((course) => (
{course.image}

{course.title}

{course.rating} ({course.reviews})

)}
))}
{/* Bottom Navigation */}
Home Courses Dashboard Profile
); }; export default CoursesPage;
